CHAT.comment: This mealtime lasts for 8:26 and includes Mot , FAT , Chi and her two younger brothers , BRO and BR2. BR2 has not begun to talk yet , but provides a lot of background noise throughout the length of the tape. Chi talks quite a bit , at first about who she babysat the night before , and then about the movie she saw at the same time , The Santa Clause. Bro interjects about the movie as well. Fat seems to be taking care of BR2 and is somewhat involved , although the main conversation is dominated by Chi and Mot.

u.a: could be another member of the family speaking
BRO pretending to be another person at the table
everyone present says grace in unison
BR2 makes unintelligble noises in the background throughout the rest of the tape
aft sounds of loud chewing , accelerating speed .
